channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 walking and biking safety tips that just might save your life
item.description: In 2024, 7,100 pedestrians were killed on the road, and in recent years, more than 1,000 cyclists have been hit and killed annually. Safety experts ex...

item.title: Dallas ICE shooting updates. And, Trump threatens layoffs amid looming shutdown.

item.title: A judge ruled their firings were illegal. The government got to do it anyway

item.title: Tensions are high in a Utah redistricting fight that didn't start with Trump
item.description: Like Texas, Utah Republicans are redrawing congressional maps mid-decade. Unlike Texas, Utah's new maps could give Democrats more of a shot at winning...

item.title: Danish officials believe drone flyovers at 4 airports meant to sow fear
item.description: Defense Minister Troels Lund Poulsen said it appeared a "professional actor" was behind the "systematic" flights, without providing additional details...

item.title: Nicolas Sarkozy sentenced to five years in Libya campaign financing case
item.description: The former French president was found guilty of criminal conspiracy but cleared of other charges.

item.title: 9/24: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: One person killed, two more critically injured in Texas ICE facility shooting; New documentary uncovers government deception during Afghanistan War.

item.title: Lawsuit: Ohio cop who shot pregnant mom "recklessly escalated" response

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog boss on how the series keeps up to speed
item.description: The video game icon has been taking shots at an old rival, but the real competition comes from newer games.

item.title: Court convicts man of killing woman's puppy, citing gender violence law
item.description: This is the first time a Spanish court has applied legislation against vicarious violence to a case where an animal was harmed, a legal watchdog said.

item.title: Pokémon did not give permission for ICE deportation video
item.description: The theme song, Ash Ketchum and slogan "Gotta catch 'em all" featured in a US government video.

item.title: 'Anti-ICE' message on ammunition at Dallas shooting that killed immigration detainee
item.description: The gunman fired at an unmarked van near the detention facility, before taking his own life, officials say.

item.title: 8/21: CBS Morning News
item.description: Texas House passes GOP redistricting plan; Menendez brothers' parole hearings begin today.

item.title: Denmark says 'professional actor' behind drone incursions over its airports
item.description: But the defence minister says there is no evidence of Russian involvement after the latest incident.

item.title: 1 detainee killed and 2 others critically injured in Dallas ICE facility, Homeland Security says
item.description: Authorities say a shooter with a rifle opened fire from a roof onto a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement location in Dallas.
